description_txt: stated on April 5, 2020 in a post:
quote_txt: Says Rudy Giuliani "bought $2M in shares of Novartis, a primary supplier of hydroxychloroquine" in early February.

description_txt: stated on March 17, 2020 in social media posts:
quote_txt: “While all COVID-19 news has been going on, the U.S. Government has been sneakily trying to remove end-to-end encryption” which means “the government will be able to see all of your messages and listen to all of your calls.”

description_txt: stated on April 5, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: People are handing out masks “doused with chemicals which knocks you out cold” so they can rob you.

description_txt: stated on April 7, 2020 in a news conference:
quote_txt: Wisconsin is “run by Democrats right now,” so they should address election social distancing concerns.

description_txt: stated on April 5, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: “In Italy, they have thrown their money on the streets. A clear message to the whole world that money is not enough when health is in danger.”

description_txt: stated on January 3, 2019 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says cutting out sugar and drinking hot lemon water will cure cancer.

description_txt: stated on April 8, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says a California surfer was “alone, in the ocean,” when he was arrested for violating the state’s stay-at-home order.

description_txt: stated on April 6, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: “North Carolina & Virginia State line is closed. Nothing in or out."

description_txt: stated on April 6, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says this poem about people staying home was written by Kathleen O’Mara in 1869.

description_txt: stated on April 7, 2020 in a news conference:
quote_txt: “As soon as I endorsed (Supreme Court Justice Daniel Kelly), the Wisconsin Democrats said, let’s move the election to two months later.”

description_txt: stated on April 5, 2020 in a CNN interview:
quote_txt: Says of the coronavirus threat, “there was not a single suggestion by anyone, a doctor, a scientist, a political figure, that we needed to cancel Mardi Gras.”

description_txt: stated on April 1, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: “Non-essential people get to file for unemployment and make two to three times more than normal,” but essential workers still on the job get no pay raise.

description_txt: stated on April 6, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: “59 people die as pastor gives them dettol to drink in church to prevent coronavirus.”

description_txt: stated on April 6, 2020 in a White House briefing:
quote_txt: The Obama administration left Trump with a “stockpile with a cupboard that was bare.”

description_txt: stated on March 31, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: “If you’ve let somebody claim your kids for income tax purposes, you will not receive a stimulus check. The person who claimed your kids is gonna get it.”

description_txt: stated on April 2, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says video shows “the Chinese are destroying the 5G poles as they are aware that it is the thing triggering the corona symptoms.”

description_txt: stated on April 2, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says Goodwill used the pandemic “to fire all of their employees instead of laying them off.”

description_txt: stated on April 6, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says Queen Elizabeth said Philippine President Rodrigo Duterte “is the kind of leader who knows the way .... Filipinos are very lucky to have him.”

description_txt: stated on April 3, 2020 in a tweet:
quote_txt: “The Chinese Communist Party is using Zoom as a way to spy on our citizens.”

description_txt: stated on April 2, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Photo shows a crowded New York City subway train during stay-at-home order.

description_txt: stated on April 6, 2020 in a tweet:
quote_txt: Says a ballot can be emailed to Wisconsin voters even a day before the election.

description_txt: stated on March 26, 2020 in a tweet:
quote_txt: “Pelosi tried to block voter ID/absentee ballot protections.”

description_txt: stated on April 3, 2020 in a fake news article:
quote_txt: Says celebrities are calling for a "'total Hollywood strike' until Trump resigns."

description_txt: stated on March 23, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says Joe Biden stuck a gun in an elderly woman’s mouth at a Wisconsin rally

description_txt: stated on April 1, 2020 in in a White House briefing:
quote_txt: “Now, they’re doing tests on airlines — very strong tests — for getting on, getting off. They’re doing tests on trains — getting on, getting off.”

description_txt: stated on April 2, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: “Rivers in Oklahoma are full of catfish carrying the virus.”

description_txt: stated on April 5, 2020 in a fake news article:
quote_txt: Says the NBA is asking Donald Trump to “resign or we’ll never play again.”

description_txt: stated on March 29, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: “Unemployment now pays $24/hour, even if your wages were lower. Why don’t ‘essential’ people forced to still work get $24, too?”

description_txt: stated on April 4, 2020 in a Coronavirus Task Force press briefing:
quote_txt: Says fired inspector general Michael Atkinson brought a “terrible, inaccurate whistleblower report” to Congress.

description_txt: stated on April 2, 2020 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: Says Nostradamus predicted the coronavirus in a 1551 passage about a plague spreading from the east.
